welcome.abstract: This screen needs to be cleaned-up.

screen1.title: IRMA is your identity on your mobile
screen1.text: Your official name, date of birth, address, and more. All securely stored in your IRMA app.

screen2.title: Make yourself known with IRMA
screen2.text: Easy, secure, and fast. It's all in your hands.

screen3.title: IRMA provides certainty, to you and to others
screen3.text: Your data are stored solely within the IRMA app. Only you have access.

choose_pin.title: Secure your IRMA app
choose_pin.error: PINs do not match. Choose a new PIN.

provide_email.title: Secure your IRMA app
provide_email.instruction: An email address allows you to disable your IRMA app when your mobile has been lost or stolen.
provide_email.error: This is not a valid email address
provide_email.skip_content: Protect your data. When you enter an email address, you can block your IRMA app when your mobile has been lost or stolen.

email_sent.title: Secure your IRMA app
email_sent.message_markdown: You have received an email from **noreply@sidn.nl**. Open the link in this message to link your email address to your IRMA app.
email_sent.mail_sent_text_markdown: The email has been sent to: **{emailaddress}**.
email_sent.check_spam: It can take a moment until the email arrives. Check your spam folder if you don't see the mail in your inbox.

help.question_1: What can I do with IRMA?
help.answer_1_markdown:
With IRMA it's easy to log in and make yourself known. You disclose only the necessary attributes of yourself. For instance, in order to watch a certain movie, you disclose that you are over 16 years old and nothing else. With IRMA you can digitally sign documents too. You only use relevant characteristics of yourself, in some sort of digital stamp. In this way IRMA allows you to sign as medical doctor, as citizen, or in some other role.

More and more websites support logging in with IRMA. For instance, doctors in The Netherlands can access medical dossiers via the website [helder](https://www.helder.health/). IRMA support is growing especially at municipalities and health care providers. To get an idea of the possibilities, you can try out yourself some of the available IRMA [demo's](https://privacybydesign.foundation/demo-en/).
help.answer_2:
**IRMA exists because you have the right to an online identity that you really own.** IRMA is not a commercial app that is used to track you, to profile you and to sell your personal data to third parties.

IRMA is in the spirit of the [General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)](https://gdpr-info.eu/). Via the IRMA app you disclose only these data about yourself that are relevant and necessary in a particular situation.

**With the IRMA app your identity is in your own hands, within the secured IRMA app on your own phone.** The IRMA app is is a powerful means for making yourself known (online) and for digital signing. With respect for your privacy.
help.question_3: Who is behind the IRMA app?
help.answer_3:
IRMA is produced by the **Privacy by Design** foundation. In 2016 this foundation grew out of the Digital Security research group at Radboud University Nijmegen. This foundation is independent and non-profit.

The IRMA app is open source and is developed jointly with SIDN, the manager of the .nl-domain. This development is done jointly with local government and health care. Some 30 municipalities are involved, including Nijmegen, Amsterdam and Leiden. IRMA is recipient of the Dutch Privacy Awards 2018.
help.question_4: How to use IRMA for logging onto a mobile website?

answer_4.step_1: Open the website on your mobile and select logging in with IRMA.
answer_4.step_2:
The IRMA app starts automatically.
Enter your PIN.
answer_4.step_3: Agree (or disagree) to disclose your personal data.
answer_4.step_4:
After disclosing you are logged in.
You can now use the website.

help.question_5: How to use IRMA for logging onto a website on my computer?

answer_5.step_1: Open the website on your computer and select logging in with IRMA.
answer_5.step_2: Open the IRMA app on your mobile and enter your PIN.
answer_5.step_3: Start the QR code scanner in the IRMA app. Scan the QR code on the screen of your computer.
answer_5.step_4: Agree (or not) to disclose your personal data.
answer_5.step_5:
After disclosing you are logged in.
You can now use the website.

help.question_6: What to do if I lose my mobile?
help.answer_6_markdown:
If you lose your mobile, nobody can use your IRMA app, at least if you have chosen a non-trivial PIN.

You can protect yourself even more: upon installing IRMA you have been given the choice to enter an email address. If you have done so, you can block your IRMA app altogether via [MyIRMA](https://privacybydesign.foundation/myirma/). The IRMA app on your old (lost) mobile is then completely unusable.

If you have not yet added an email address in [MyIRMA](https://privacybydesign.foundation/myirma/) you can still do so now. This is recommended.

On your new mobile you can re-install the IRMA app and re-fill it with your data. Then you are good to go again.
help.question_7: Can I install IRMA on multiple mobile devices?
help.answer_7: Yes, on every mobile device (Android or iOS) you can open a separate IRMA account and fill it with cards with your personal data. It is actually wise to do so. If you lose one device, you can still log on with your other device.
help.question_8: Where are my IRMA data stored?
help.answer_8:
Your data are stored in the IRMA app on your mobile and not in the cloud.

You explicitly agree (or not) to reveal your personal data from your IRMA app to a website.
When you remove your data from the IRMA app, they are really gone from IRMA.
help.question_9: What makes IRMA privacy-friendly and secure?
help.answer_9:
Your personal data are protected via your personal PIN. Your data are stored exclusively in the IRMA app and not in the cloud.

The data in your IRMA app are digitally signed by the source (issuer) where the data come from (such as the local authorities).

In this way a website or shop, where you make yourself known, can cryptographically verify that your data are genuine.
This exchange of personal data happens directly between your mobile and the website. No one else can see that you make yourself known there, not even the organisation behind IRMA.
help.question_10: Why do the data in the IRMA app have limited validity?
help.answer_10:
Every card in IRMA shows its validity. The validity period depends on the kind of data on the card and how stable these data are. Your name and date of birth data are valid for five years, but your address data only one year. The source (issuer) of the data determines this validity period. The cards in your IRMA app may thus expire. The IRMA app then gives you a warning.

You can always, also without such a warning, refresh your cards by reloading them from the source. For instance, after your 18th birthday you can reload your data from your municipality so that you can prove that you are older than 18 now.
help.question_11: What makes IRMA privacy-friendly and secure?
help.answer_11:
Your personal data are protected via your personal PIN. Your data are stored exclusively in the IRMA app and not in the cloud.

The data in your IRMA app are digitally signed by the source (issuer) where the data come from (such as the local authorities).

In this way a website or shop, where you make yourself known, can cryptographically verify that your data are genuine.
This exchange of personal data happens directly between your mobile and the website. No one else can see that you make yourself known there, not even the organisation behind IRMA.
help.send: Do you have other/more questions? Send an email. It may take a couple of days before you get a reply.
help.title: Help

webview.alert_message: The website that you wish to visit is not secure. You cannot view it within IRMA. Open another (browser) app if you still wish to visit this website.

card.delete_content: If you proceed, this card will be deleted from your IRMA app.

card_store.choose: Choose the data you wish to add.

settings.title: Settings
settings.start_qr: Open QR scanner automatically after start-up

advanced.delete_content: If you proceed, all your cards will be deleted from your IRMA app. Do you wish to use IRMA again later? You will have to reload cards first.
advanced.enable_screenshots_note: When enabled, the app will not be blurred in the app switcher.

choose_pin.title: Change PIN
choose_pin.error: Different PINs. Choose a new PIN.

confirm_pin.title: Change PIN
confirm_pin.instruction: Enter your PIN one more time.

instruction.title: Start scanning
instruction.message: Aim the camera of your mobile at the IRMA QR code
instruction.semantic: Start scanning! Aim the camera of your mobile at the IRMA QR code.

error.title: Sorry
error.message: This is not an IRMA QR code
error.semantic: Sorry! This is not an IRMA QR code.

invalid_pin.attempts-0: This PIN is not correct. You have {attemps} attempts left before your IRMA app will be blocked temporarily.
invalid_pin.attempts-1: This PIN is not correct. You have {attemps} attempt left before your IRMA app will be blocked temporarily.
invalid_pin.attempts-2: This PIN is not correct. You have {attemps} attempts left before your IRMA app will be blocked temporarily.

pin_common.blocked_pin: Your account has been blocked for {blocked}. Please try again later.

session_pin.subtitle: Re-enter your PIN to continue.
session_pin.explanation: For your safety, the IRMA app regularly asks for your PIN.

error.title: Something went wrong
error.report: If this happens again, please inform IRMA's technical team.

types.blocked:
Your IRMA app has been remotely blocked.

This has either been done via MyIRMA for your app, or because you did not use IRMA on this device for more than a year. If you want to continue using IRMA on this device, you will need to start over.
types.expired: The session has expired. Please start over.
types.pairing_rejected: The session was rejected. Please start over.
types.no_internet:
Something went wrong. IRMA needs internet.

Please check your internet connection.

wallet.title: IRMA cards
wallet.revoked: This card is no longer valid
wallet.cannot_be_refreshed: This card cannot be refreshed anymore.
wallet.caption: Your data securely on your mobile

issuance.title: Add cards
issuance.header-0: Do you wish to add this card to your IRMA app?
issuance.header-1: Do you wish to add this card to your IRMA app?
issuance.header-2: Do you wish to add these cards to your IRMA app?

pairing.title: Extra safety check
pairing.explanation: Please enter the code below on the website.
pairing.message_body_markdown: A pairing code makes sure that the following steps can only be done in *your* IRMA app.

unknown_session_type.title: Cancelled
unknown_session_type.explanation: The IRMA session that you started is not supported by the app.

disclosure.title: Data request
disclosure.disclosure_header: Do you wish to disclose the following data to {otherParty}?
disclosure.disclosure_call_header: Do you wish to diclose the following data to {otherParty} and call to {phoneNumber}?
disclosure.signing_header: {otherParty} asks you to sign a message
disclosure.signing_call_header: {otherParty} asks you to sign a message and call to {phoneNumber}
disclosure.unsatisfiable_header: You don't yet have all data that {otherParty} is asking for in your IRMA app.
disclosure.not_present: These data have not yet been added to IRMA.
disclosure.not_present_have_other: The requested data do not match with the data you already have.
disclosure.add_additional: Want to show different information? Add an additional '{credential}' card.
disclosure.not_revokable: These data have to be refreshed first.

explanation.title: You can choose
explanation.body: Select which data you disclose. Use the arrow or swipe and choose.

disclosure.redirect: You are being redirected back to the webpage...

text.canceled: Your data are not disclosed to {otherParty}
text.notSatisfiable: Your data are not disclosed because {otherParty} requests outdated cards. Please contact this party.

call_info.title: Call via IRMA
call_info.success_message_markdown:
Your data have now been disclosed to **{otherParty}**.
Complete the steps below to start the call.
call_info.success_message_ios_markdown: Your data have now been disclosed to **{otherParty}**.
call_info.continue_message: Your phone app now opens automatically. The number is pre-filled, followed by a link-code.
call_info.continue_message_ios: A pop-up will appear, with the option to place the call. The number is pre-filled, followed by a link-code. If you choose to call, you will hear a few beeps and you will be connected.
call_info.call: 2. Tap the call button in your phone app
call_info.call_message: You will hear a few beeps and you will be connected.

reset_pin.title: Lost PIN
reset_pin.message: Lost your PIN? We're sorry but the IRMA organisation does not keep record of your PIN. If you wish to continue using IRMA, you will have to enter a new PIN and reload all data.
reset_pin.existing_data_title: What happens with my old cards?
reset_pin.existing_data_message: Your old cards will be deleted from your phone. If you like, you can collect new cards and start using IRMA again.
reset_pin.existing_data_removed: All cards in your IRMA app are deleted.

arrow_back.info_success-0: Done, your data have been disclosed.
arrow_back.safari: Tap on the name of the application (such as Safari, Chrome, Firefox) in the top left corner to return to the application you came from.

update.required: In order to continue using IRMA, you will need to update the app

device_rooted_warning.title: Device unsafe
device_rooted_warning.body: The operating system on your device seems to be modified. Because of this, the safety of your data cannot be guaranteed.

app_tab.stay_informed: Stay informed and join the conversation
